snippet: “The Songs of Henry Krieger,” featuring the catalog of this “Dreamgirls” composer, was the latest addition to the American Songbook series at Jazz at Lincoln Center.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews concert tribute to Broadway composer Henry Krieger in the Allen Room at Lincoln Center as part of its American Songbook series.
lead_paragraph: “The Songs of Henry Krieger,” featuring the catalog of this “Dreamgirls” composer, was the latest addition to the American Songbook series at Jazz at Lincoln Center.

headline.seo: Singing Henry Krieger’s Songbook at the Allen Room
